biography: Jonas, a name synonymous with dedication at Vantaan Golfpuisto, has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée twice. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Jonas brings a strategic mindset to every round. Although he has not secured a victory at the Hector Trophée nor claimed the individual Victor Trophy, his presence is always noted.

Off the course, Jonas is known for his quiet demeanor and thoughtful insights, often engaging in deep discussions about course design and the mental aspects of golf. While Jonas is considered retired from the Hector Trophée events, his passion for the sport remains undiminished.
